properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 29 at 5:28AM AKST until March 1 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of
up to 11 inches near White Pass. Winds gusting as high as 55
mph.

* WHERE...Klondike Highway and White Pass.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM AKST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility to one quarter mile or
less.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will mix with rain Saturday evening
near sea level. An area of freezing rain is possible along the
highway.
properties.instruction:
Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must
travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded,
stay with your vehicle.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM AKST SUNDAY
